content:
We are changing the look and feel of the content headers in the latest version of the HL7 IG-publisher for the CapababilityStatement. This change has left an orphaned link to a downloadable Swagger file 1/3 down the page and has prompted us to seek community feed back.

image.png

Does anyone use this swagger file?
If so how?

We are considering :

  • keeping this link and file and moving to the bottom
  • removing it if it not a useful artifact
  • keeping this link and replacing with community supplied version update that is deemed more useful.

let us know your thoughts
